topic.title: Update plugin FusionInventory for GLPI
topic.shortdesc: This describe how to update plugin FusionInventory for GLPI

ul.li: Download archive of the plugin here : http://forge.fusioninventory.org/projects/fusioninventory-for-glpi/files
Delete the "Fusioninventory" folder located in glpi/plugins

li.p: Uncompress the file into the plugin folder of GLPI. The files list should be as follows:

ul.li: Go into the menu Configuration > Plugins
Install FusionInventory. The plugin will update. The speed of the update process may vary (from a few seconds to several minutes/hours).

body.p: These operations will modify tables and datas in database MySQL and rights on the plugin.
